analysis.description:
Reentrancy in LittlePhilCrowdsale.mintForPrivateFiat (/unique_chucks/2/0x808508acb3f5f9aef7950375bedb8f001cccab77.sol):
	External calls:
	- _processPurchase(_beneficiary,tokens) (/unique_chucks/2/0x808508acb3f5f9aef7950375bedb8f001cccab77.sol)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- state (/unique_chucks/2/0x808508acb3f5f9aef7950375bedb8f001cccab77.sol)
	- tokenCap (/unique_chucks/2/0x808508acb3f5f9aef7950375bedb8f001cccab77.sol)
	- tokensRaised (/unique_chucks/2/0x808508acb3f5f9aef7950375bedb8f001cccab77.sol)

Reentrancy in TokenVesting.release (/unique_chucks/2/0x808508acb3f5f9aef7950375bedb8f001cccab77.sol#1276-1282):
	External calls:
	- unreleased = releasableAmount(token) (/unique_chucks/2/0x808508acb3f5f9aef7950375bedb8f001cccab77.sol#1276-1277)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- released (/unique_chucks/2/0x808508acb3f5f9aef7950375bedb8f001cccab77.sol#1278)

Reentrancy in TokenVesting.revoke (/unique_chucks/2/0x808508acb3f5f9aef7950375bedb8f001cccab77.sol#1292-1303):
	External calls:
	- balance = token.balanceOf(this) (/unique_chucks/2/0x808508acb3f5f9aef7950375bedb8f001cccab77.sol#1297-1298)
	- unreleased = releasableAmount(token) (/unique_chucks/2/0x808508acb3f5f9aef7950375bedb8f001cccab77.sol#1298-1299)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- revoked (/unique_chucks/2/0x808508acb3f5f9aef7950375bedb8f001cccab77.sol#1301)

Reentrancy in InitialSupplyCrowdsale.setupInitialSupply (/unique_chucks/2/0x808508acb3f5f9aef7950375bedb8f001cccab77.sol#1187-1205):
	External calls:
	- LittlePhilCoin(token).mint(companyWallet,companyTokens) (/unique_chucks/2/0x808508acb3f5f9aef7950375bedb8f001cccab77.sol#1198-1199)
	- LittlePhilCoin(token).mint(projectWallet,projectTokens) (/unique_chucks/2/0x808508acb3f5f9aef7950375bedb8f001cccab77.sol#1199-1200)
	- LittlePhilCoin(token).mint(advisorWallet,advisorTokens) (/unique_chucks/2/0x808508acb3f5f9aef7950375bedb8f001cccab77.sol#1200-1201)
	- LittlePhilCoin(token).mint(bountyWallet,bountyTokens) (/unique_chucks/2/0x808508acb3f5f9aef7950375bedb8f001cccab77.sol#1201-1202)
	- LittlePhilCoin(token).mint(airdropWallet,airdropTokens) (/unique_chucks/2/0x808508acb3f5f9aef7950375bedb8f001cccab77.sol#1202-1203)
	- LittlePhilCoin(token).mint(address(teamTimeLock1),teamTokensSplit) (/unique_chucks/2/0x808508acb3f5f9aef7950375bedb8f001cccab77.sol#1203-1204)
	- LittlePhilCoin(token).mint(address(teamTimeLock2),teamTokensSplit) (/unique_chucks/2/0x808508acb3f5f9aef7950375bedb8f001cccab77.sol#1204-1205)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- isInitialised (/unique_chucks/2/0x808508acb3f5f9aef7950375bedb8f001cccab77.sol#1205)

InitialSupplyCrowdsale.setupInitialSupply (/unique_chucks/2/0x808508acb3f5f9aef7950375bedb8f001cccab77.sol#1187-1205) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-LittlePhilCoin(token).mint(companyWallet,companyTokens) (/unique_chucks/2/0x808508acb3f5f9aef7950375bedb8f001cccab77.sol#1198-1199)
	-LittlePhilCoin(token).mint(projectWallet,projectTokens) (/unique_chucks/2/0x808508acb3f5f9aef7950375bedb8f001cccab77.sol#1199-1200)

	-LittlePhilCoin(token).mint(bountyWallet,bountyTokens) (/unique_chucks/2/0x808508acb3f5f9aef7950375bedb8f001cccab77.sol#1201-1202)
	-LittlePhilCoin(token).mint(airdropWallet,airdropTokens) (/unique_chucks/2/0x808508acb3f5f9aef7950375bedb8f001cccab77.sol#1202-1203)
	-LittlePhilCoin(token).mint(address(teamTimeLock1),teamTokensSplit) (/unique_chucks/2/0x808508acb3f5f9aef7950375bedb8f001cccab77.sol#1203-1204)
	-LittlePhilCoin(token).mint(address(teamTimeLock2),teamTokensSplit) (/unique_chucks/2/0x808508acb3f5f9aef7950375bedb8f001cccab77.sol#1204-1205)

TokenVestingCrowdsale.addBeneficiaryVestor (/unique_chucks/2/0x808508acb3f5f9aef7950375bedb8f001cccab77.sol#1341-1356) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-LittlePhilCoin(token).mint(address(newVault),tokenAmount) (/unique_chucks/2/0x808508acb3f5f9aef7950375bedb8f001cccab77.sol#1355-1356)

LittlePhilCrowdsale.crowdsaleClosed (/unique_chucks/2/0x808508acb3f5f9aef7950375bedb8f001cccab77.sol#1446-1455) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-LittlePhilCoin(token).finishMinting() (/unique_chucks/2/0x808508acb3f5f9aef7950375bedb8f001cccab77.sol#1454-1455)

TokenTimelock.constructor (/unique_chucks/2/0x808508acb3f5f9aef7950375bedb8f001cccab77.sol#1110-1115) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(_releaseTime > block.timestamp) (/unique_chucks/2/0x808508acb3f5f9aef7950375bedb8f001cccab77.sol#1114)

TokenTimelock.release (/unique_chucks/2/0x808508acb3f5f9aef7950375bedb8f001cccab77.sol#1116-1122) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(block.timestamp >= releaseTime) (/unique_chucks/2/0x808508acb3f5f9aef7950375bedb8f001cccab77.sol#1117-1118)

TokenVesting.vestedAmount (/unique_chucks/2/0x808508acb3f5f9aef7950375bedb8f001cccab77.sol#1324-1340) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp >= start.add(duration) || revoked[token] (/unique_chucks/2/0x808508acb3f5f9aef7950375bedb8f001cccab77.sol#1333-1340)
	- block.timestamp < cliff (/unique_chucks/2/0x808508acb3f5f9aef7950375bedb8f001cccab77.sol#1331-1340)
